name: Empty Desert (Wagon Road)
description: A gently curving stretch of dusty wagon road, a subtle deviation in the otherwise endless expanse of the empty desert. The path here is faint, a mere suggestion of passage across the vast, indifferent landscape. The wagon road continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a testament to the vast, undeveloped frontier. To the east, a weathered structure hints at a place of learning or records. The air is still, thick with dust and the scent of dry sagebrush, broken only by the distant cry of a hawk, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
